title: Bloomberg's Clough: GE Shedding 'Too Big To Fail' Label (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Clough: GE Shedding 'Too Big To Fail' Label (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Rick Clough, Industrial reporter for Bloomberg News, on GE winning approval to drop its designation as a too-big-to-fail financial instruction.
